1934 FIFA World Cup squads

\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t\t
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\n\t\t\t\t

Below are the squads for the 1934 FIFA World Cup final tournament in Italy.

\n

Brazil and Czechoslovakia were the only teams to have players from foreign clubs.

\n

United States[edit]

\n

Head coach: David Gould
